title: dogs_sunbathing_winter_morning
summary: Dogs resting and sunbathing during winter morning at MaMeeFarm.
description: This data unit records dogs lying on gravel ground and sunbathing during a winter morning at MaMeeFarm. The behavior reflects natural thermal regulation, where dogs seek sunlight for warmth in colder seasonal conditions.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
